meanings.definition: A family of small, slender, marine fishes including herrings, sardines, and anchovies.
meanings.sent1: Clupeids like herrings and sardines are commonly found in oceans.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of clupeids swimming gracefully near the shore.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clupeids throw a party? Because they heard it was a fish-tastic event!
meanings.sent4: The shimmering silver of the clupeids in the water resembled a moving wave of light.
meanings.sent5: The salty breeze carried the scent of the clupeids, a reminder of the sea's bounty.

meanings.definition: Any fish of the family Clupeidae.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had a diverse collection of clupeids from different regions.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen study the behavior of clupeids to improve their catch.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clupeids start a band? Because they wanted to scale up their music career!
meanings.sent4: In the river, the clupeids moved in unison like a silver ribbon in the water.
meanings.sent5: The glimmer of the clupeids in the sunlight was a sight to behold.
